formulas.name: assetName
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!brandValue})), {!brandValue}& " - ", "") & {!model} & IF( ISBLANK({!size}), "", " - " & {!size} ) & IF( ISBLANK({!year}), "", " - " & {!year} )

formulas.name: serviceType
formulas.expression: IF(LOWER({!contractType}) = 'cr','Piscine creusée', IF(LOWER({!contractType}) = 'sc','Piscine semi-creusée', IF(LOWER({!contractType}) = 'ht','Piscine hors-terre', IF(LOWER({!contractType}) = 'spa','Spa', Null))))

fields.name: Assets_Screen_Warning_Message
fields.fieldText: ﻿{!$Label.Assets_Screen_Warning_Msg}
